meanings.definition: A person who paints with watercolors.
meanings.sent1: The talented watercolorists displayed their beautiful artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: Many watercolorists enjoy painting landscapes and flowers.
meanings.sent3: The watercolorists had a friendly competition to see who could paint the silliest animal.
meanings.sent4: Her brush danced across the paper like a group of skilled watercolorists.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors used by the watercolorists brought the paintings to life.

meanings.definition: The group of artists who specialize in using watercolors.
meanings.sent1: At the art fair, the watercolorists had a booth showcasing their collective works.
meanings.sent2: The watercolorists often meet to discuss new techniques and share inspiration.
meanings.sent3: The watercolorists decided to paint a mural together to brighten up the community center.
meanings.sent4: The gallery featured a stunning exhibition by the watercolorists, drawing art enthusiasts from far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The watercolorists' annual show was a colorful celebration of creativity and talent.
